title: Daniel Gonzalez: The Freddy Krueger Killer
description:
Former FBI agent and criminal profiler, Candice DeLong digs into the peculiar case of Daniel Gonzalez, nicknamed "The Freddy Krueger Killer."


Listen to new episodes 1 week early and to all episodes ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. https://wondery.app.link/killerpsyche
